title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list in the File menu do not appear when the application is restarted. However, they should be persisted and continue to be displayed in the MRU list between sessions.
EB: The files should be properly persisted and continue to be displayed in the MRU list when the application is restarted.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the application and open some files. 2. Close the application. 3. Restart the application. 4. Observe the MRU list in the File menu and confirm that the previously opened files are not displayed.
